ej,olivm001,P,hicke901,Throwing punch at Jose Reyes during pitching change $as the Marlins started to make a pitching change, catcher Miguel Olivo was standing on the mound and exchanged words with runner Jose Reyes, who was at 3B; Olivo ran towards Reyes and 3B coach Sandy Alomar Sr. intervened as Olivo began throwing punches at Reyes, none of which landed; Marlins catcher Miguel Olivo ejected by 3B umpire Ed Hickox
$only the second time in 20 years that Glavine has hit a batter with the bases loaded
